mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ID, PASS, NAME, LEVEL FROM MEMBERS ORDER BY IDX
SELECT deviceCode, deviceName, (SELECT MUSICCODE FROM SPEAKERMUSIC WHERE DEVICECODE = #{_parameter}) musicCode FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICECODE = #{_parameter}
SELECT d.deviceCode, d.deviceName FROM DEVICE d INNER JOIN SPEAKERMUSIC sm ON d.deviceCode = sm.deviceCode INNER JOIN MUSIC m ON sm.musicCode = m.musicCode WHERE m.musicCode = #{_parameter}
SELECT P.pictureCode, P.pPath, p.pFullName FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN PICTURE P ON M.HOMEIMG = P.PICTURECODE WHERE M.MEMBERCODE = #{_parameter}
SELECT PICTURECODE FROM PICTURE WHERE PFULLNAME = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSIC (MADD, MORINAME, MFULLNAME, MEMBERCODE) VALUES (#{filePath}, #{orgFileName}, #{fullFileName}, #{uid})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comCode, c.date, c.workYN, c.comandLevel, c.deviceCode, m.musicCode, m.mOriName, (select a.tel from member a where a.memberCode = m.memberCode) userPhone FROM COMMAND c INNER JOIN SPEAKERMUSIC sm ON c.deviceCode = sm.deviceCode INNER JOIN MUSIC m ON sm.musicCode = m.musicCode WHERE c.deviceCode = #{_parameter} AND c.workYN="N" AND c.date >= date_add(now(), interval -1 minute)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMAND (DATE, DEVICECODE, COMANDLEVEL) VALUES (NOW(), #{deviceCode}, #{comandLevel})
INSERT INTO DEVICE (deviceIP, deviceName, deviceSort, memberCode, sensorCode) VALUES (#{deviceIP},#{deviceName},#{deviceSort},#{memberCode},0)

INSERT INTO PICTURE (PPATH, pORINAME, PFULLNAME, THUMB_PPATH, THUMB_PORINAME, THUMB_PFULLNAME, DATE, DEVICECODE) VALUES (#{filePath}, #{orgFileName}, #{fullFileName}, #{tFilePath}, #{tOrgFileName}, #{tfullFileName}, NOW(), #{deviceCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE PICTURE SET PPATH = #{filePath}, pORINAME = #{orgFileName}, PFULLNAME = #{fullFileName}, THUMB_PPATH = #{tFilePath}, THUMB_PORINAME = #{tOrgFileName}, THUMB_PFULLNAME = #{tfullFileName}, DATE = NOW(), DEVICECODE = #{deviceCode} WHERE PICTURECODE = #{beforeImgCode}
